content: I only know pancakesniperbot.com but it`s bloody expensive   Is there anything else that is cheaper but has all the features of pancake sniper plus?I need a front running feature and sandwich bot feature. It doesn`t matter what OS.I could also buy your copy of pancake sniper plus if you don't use it anymore. I can pay half of the market price. Please PM if you wanna sell.

comments.author: cryptoniccc
comments.body: Hey man, have you bought it? What was your experience?

comments.author: Amicable55
comments.body: Please rate your experience if you use it

comments.author: markko7
comments.body: Sorry, it took me a while to respond  I ended up buying uniswap sniper plus from the same website (pancakesniperbot.com). I choosed uniswap as I focus on sandwich trading and I found comments that sandwich trading works better on uniswap bot then on pancake bot. I'm satisfied with the bot and customer support. With sandwich trading it works like a charm.
